response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, which I believe could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its importance to me, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. I understand its value to you might be around $800,000, but I hope my proposal will be appealing enough to consider. Should you have any questions or require further details about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this exceptional piece into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
